definition: tea egg (egg boiled with flavorings which may include black tea)

sentences.english: At last it puts forward the countermeasures to the development of tea industrialization in Ying Shan County.
sentences.chinese: 最后一部分重点探讨英山县茶叶产业化发展的对策。

sentences.english: In 1767 Britain put customs duty on many goods such as tea.
sentences.chinese: 1767年，英国对许多货物征收关税，例如茶叶。

sentences.english: Don't swill the tealeaves out into the sink.
During the XIX century, the English owned the tea marked in China.
sentences.chinese: 在十九世纪，英国控制着中国的茶叶市场。

sentences.english: Every tea ball has tea leaves and a flower.
sentences.chinese: 每种茶球里有茶叶和花配成。

sentences.english: Tea polysaccharide is a kind of acid mucopolysaccharide, has the significant effect on reducing blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: 茶叶多糖是一种酸性粘多糖，具有显著降血糖效果。

sentences.english: Tea scholars are searching the area in Northwestern Anhui to find someone that still knows the technique with no luck.
sentences.chinese: 茶叶学家正在安徽的西北地区寻找会制作黄茶的人。

sentences.english: where the men who used to trade with the tea or the big clock merchants.
sentences.chinese: 那里男人曾经做茶叶的贸易或者大的钟表商。

sentences.english: An egg had tea in a caff , as a result, it became a tea-leaf egg.
sentences.chinese: 有一个鸡蛋去茶馆喝茶，结果它变成了茶叶蛋。

sentences.english: Chinese and other Asian cultures make tea with the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 中国和其他亚洲文化通常使用花来做茶叶。

sentences.english: Brunet dress in the oil, tea 8g into can decontamination.
sentences.chinese: 深色衣服上的油渍，用残茶叶搓洗能去污。

sentences.english: "The tea leaves that are falling—as sparse as they are—are falling on the negative side, " said Jim Meyer, chief investment officer at Tower Bridge Advisors.
sentences.chinese: 正如茶叶本身的稀少的一样，茶叶正下跌为负数。

sentences.english: "The tea leaves that are falling—as sparse as they are—are falling on the negative side, " said Jim Meyer, chief investment officer at Tower Bridge Advisors.
sentences.chinese: 正如茶叶本身的稀少的一样，茶叶正下跌为负数。

sentences.english: The abandoned tea boxes can be transformed into very fine jewelry boxes.
sentences.chinese: 废弃的茶叶盒可以变身精美的首饰盒。

sentences.english: There are tea leaves in my cup - you haven't strained the tea.
sentences.chinese: 我的杯子里有茶叶，你没有滤过茶。

sentences.english: The wood was fired into charcoal for baking tea leaves.
sentences.chinese: 木头烧成炭后用来烘烤茶叶。

definition: Pu'er tea from the Pu'er region of Yunnan
dark tea, a variety of fermented tea (e.g. Pu'er tea 普洱茶[Pu3 er3 cha2])
Tieguanyin tea (a variety of oolong tea)
biluochun or pi lo chun, a type of green tea grown in the Dongting Mountain region near Lake Tai 太湖[Tai4 Hu2], Jiangsu
unprocessed sun-dried tea leaves used to make black or green tea
to add water (or other liquid) to (another ingredient such as powdered milk or tea leaves)/to infuse (tea)
